data.actual_result: The name doesn't get cutoff blocking the invite button
data.expected_result: Name should get cutoff, possibly with a ... And then there should be an invite button
data.short_description: No invite button for long names on the "invite your friends to [server]"
data.steps_to_repro: - Find someone with a long username or name a group chat something long. - Go to the invite your friends modal (if u have it) - Observe
